@dev Cancels a trade by the poster.
 @param _trade The trade to be cancelled.

cancelTrade(uint256).details: Cancels a trade by the poster.

executeTrade(uint256,uint256,bytes32).details: Executes a trade. Must have approved this contract to transfer the amount of currency specified to the poster. Transfers ownership of the item to the filler.

params._trade: The id of an existing trade
